page.title: 10YOUTH AND LEISURE
page.content: In the Horsley and Effingham area there are{Guides, Scouts, Brownies, } {Young Farmers and two Cub packs.}These all provide leisure activities for the youth of the area. The Young Farmers is a group of people aged between twelve and twenty five. they take part in outings to local companies and also help at{fund} {raising}events. They are also involved in sports such as ice skating, football and bowling. The scouts have a membership of about forty. The group consists of five patrols and is run by three leaders. They take part in many activities and go on two major camps each year.
